config.statusBarShowQuota.description: Show quota information in the status bar
config.statusBarShowCache.description: Display Antigravity IDE cache size in the status bar
config.statusBarStyle.description: Choose how to display quota information in status bar
config.statusBarThresholdWarning.descrip: Show warning color when quota falls below this percentage (default: 30%)
config.statusBarThresholdCritical.descri: Show critical color when quota falls below this percentage (default: 10%)
config.pollingInterval.description: Auto-refresh interval in seconds (minimum: 60s, recommended: 120s to reduce server load)
config.visualizationMode.description: Choose between grouped or individual model display in sidebar
config.visualizationMode.groups: Group models by category (Gemini, Claude, GPT, etc.) - cleaner view
config.visualizationMode.models: Show all individual models separately - detailed view
config.showGptQuota.description: Show GPT quota in sidebar (GPT shares quota pool with Claude, disabled by default to reduce redundancy)
config.historyDisplayMinutes.description: Time range for usage history chart in minutes (default: 60 minutes)
config.cacheCheckInterval.description: Cache check interval in seconds (minimum: 30s, default: 120s)
config.cacheWarningThreshold.description: Show warning when cache size exceeds this value in MB (default: 500MB)
config.cacheHideEmptyFolders.description: Hide empty folders in Brain and Code Tracker tree views
config.autoCleanCache.description: ⚠️ NOT IMPLEMENTED - Automatically clean cache when it exceeds the warning threshold (requires confirmation)
config.debugMode.description: Enable debug logging to 'Antigravity Panel' output channel
